ColumnTextComponent.Name: ME programs and degrees column
ColumnTextComponent.TextColumn:
The B.S. degree in Mechanical Engineering is accredited by the Engineering Accreditation Commission of the Accreditation Board for Engineering and Technology (ABET) and qualifies the student for entry-level professional engineering practice in a variety of technological fields.

The A.A.S. degrees are designed for students who want to transfer to other universities in different engineering fields.
